long_description:
You enter a large open room with one lone server rack at the
center. Hundreds of cables from throughout the building all
converge on this one machine. It has one monitor on a desk, with a
keyboard and a chair. It looks like any other computer, but
something inside you tells you that it is anything but ordinary.
You see one empty Ethernet port in front of you.

You enter a large open room with one lone server rack at the

converge on this one machine. It has one monitor on a desk, with a
keyboard and a chair. It looks like any other computer, but
something inside you tells you that it is anything but ordinary.
short_description: You are in a rooftop attic.
name: Attic
